org.sosy_lab.java_smt.test

Class ProverEnvironmentSubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.truth.Subject
      • org.sosy_lab.java_smt.test.ProverEnvironmentSubject

  • public class ProverEnvironmentSubject
extends com.google.common.truth.Subject
    Subject subclass for testing assertions about ProverEnvironments with Truth (allows to use assert_().about(...).that(stack).isUnsatisfiable() etc.).

    For a test use SolverBasedTest0.assertThatEnvironment(BasicProverEnvironment), or StandardSubjectBuilder.about(com.google.common.truth.Subject.Factory) and proverEnvironments().

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.google.common.truth.Subject

        public void isUnsatisfiable()
                     throws SolverException,
